Package gov.sandia.gmp.util.numerical.polygon

package gov.sandia.gmp.util.numerical.polygon
  • Class
    Description
    CSGOperation
    Support for the PolygonCSG operation type.
    DepthLayerInterval
    Strictly vertical containment regions that can use depth or layer ids to define point containment.
    Ellipse
     
    GeoCircle
    An interface implemented by both GreatCircle and SmallCircle.
    GreatCircle
    The GreatCircle class manages the information about a great circle path that extends from one point to another point, both or which are located on the surface of a unit sphere.
    Horizon
    Horizon is an abstract class that represents a single "surface" within a model.
    HorizonDepth
    A Horizon representing a constant depth in the model.
    HorizonLayer
    A Horizon representing a constant fractional position with a specified layer of the model.
    HorizonRadius
    A Horizon representing a constant radial position in the model.
    Polygon
    This Polygon Interface is implemented by two derived classes: Polygon2D and Polygon3D.
    Polygon2D
    An ordered list of points on the surface of a unit sphere that define a closed polygon.
    Polygon3D
    An extension of Polygon.java that includes the ability to limit the radial extent of a polygon.
    PolygonCSG
    Defines 2D lateral spatial regions on the surface of the Earth that are assembled from base Polygon2D objects using Constructive Solid Geometry (CSG) techniques.
    PolygonCSG3D
    Defines 3D lateral and vertical point PolygonCSG3D objects within the Earth.
    PolygonGlobal
    An ordered list of points on the surface of a unit sphere that define a closed polygon.
    PolygonKMLZ
     
    PolygonPoints
    An ordered list of points on the surface of a unit sphere that define a closed polygon.
    SmallCircle
    An ordered list of points on the surface of a unit sphere that define a closed polygon.
